# caption

**Type Property**

An “Open in Apple Maps” link below the content’s label.

## Declaration

```swift
static var caption: MapItemDetailSelectionAccessoryStyle { get }
```

## Accessory styles

- **automatic**: A value that allows the framework to choose an appropriate callout style automatically.
- **callout**: The accessory, shown as an annotation callout on the map.
- **sheet**: The map item detail sheet.

items.description: A value that allows the framework to choose an appropriate callout style automatically.
items.name: automatic

items.description: The accessory, shown as an annotation callout on the map.
